Improvements.Improvement: Extract repetitive code into a method
Improvements.Description: There are multiple similar blocks of code where the method 'aNotB' is called and then results are checked. This repetitive code can be extracted into a new method to improve readability and maintainability.
The literals '512', '0.0', 'Long.MAX_VALUE' are repeated multiple times. They can be extracted into constant fields, improving maintainability and reducing the chance of typos causing bugs.
